name: Wandering Gleam
description:
Wandering Gleam is a little fantasy horror exploration rpg inspired by classic rpg maker games. Here you play as a mysterious little lonely flame in a world of cute and creepy imagery. You'll have to find a way to collect all the train tickets to reach an unknown destination.

This is still a very early demo that represent the core idea of the final game, visual and storylines may change from the final version.

WARNING! This game contains flashing lights! It may cause discomfort and trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.
